Reason: The 'depths.diffuse' configuration in the 'sunflow' software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact the rendering time and memory consumption of the system. A higher value for 'depths.diffuse' can lead to more complex light interactions and calculations, resulting in longer execution times and increased memory usage. Conversely, a lower value can reduce the computational load and improve overall performance. Therefore, the 'depths.diffuse' configuration has a notable effect on system performance and is considered performance-sensitive.
